description.en:
An F-rank Hunter.

That too, a useless, pathetic F-rank hyung who dragged down his amazing S-rank brother.

To me, who’d halfheartedly lived a disastrous life that’d ended up devouring my brother’s life and making me regress, the title given, was…

‘Perfect Caregiver’

That’s right, this time, instead of fussing about myself, let’s quietly look after those amazing bastards…

…was what I’d thought, but the S-ranks are… a little weird.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iAg_R96Cnko)
description.ko:
F급 헌터.
그것도 잘나가는 S급 동생 발목이나 잡는 쓸모없고 찌질한 F급 형.
개판된 인생 대충 살다가 결국 동생 목숨까지 잡아먹고 회귀한 내게 주어진 칭호,
'완벽한 양육자'.
그래, 이번에는 나대지 말고 얌전히 잘난놈들 뒷바라지나 해 주자.
라고 생각했는데, S급들이 좀 이상하다.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iAg_R96Cnko)
description.ru:
Охотник F-ранга. И вдобавок ко всему, старший брат, который даже не может начать догонять своего великолепного младшего брата, который уже стал S-ранговым.
Прожив жизнь, которая развалилась на части, и даже разрушив жизнь своего младшего брата, я получил еще один шанс, регрессировав на пять лет назад, я принял следующее решение:
— Я стану «идеальным воспитателем».
Правильно, на этот раз, вместо того, чтобы быть посредственным охотником, я буду тихо поддерживать тех, кто способнее.
Вот о чём я думал, но... S-ранги немного... странные.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iAg_R96Cnko)

description.en:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
description.it:
Dei immortali. Sura dai poteri impareggiabili. E gli umani, che si ergono fra loro impotenti.  
Quando il pacifico villaggio di Kubera incontra la sua fine, una misteriosa maga di nome Asha accorre in suo soccorso. Insieme intraprendono un viaggio in cerca di risposte e vendetta. Mentre attraversano il regno, una rete di destini intersecati sta nascendo… Una ad una le altre pedine della scacchiera emergono, ognuna all'inseguimento dei propri obiettivi.  
Al centro di quest'uragano si trova Kubera, la ragazza con il nome di un Dio. Questa sedicenne sarà la salvatrice di questo mondo… o la sua distruttrice?
description.pl:
Bogowie z nieśmiertelnymi żywotami  
Asury z niepojętą mocą  
I ludzie, pomiędzy nimi.  
Gdy wioska Kubery zostaje zniszczona, tajemniczy mag przychodzi jej na ratunek. Razem wyruszają w podróż w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi i zemsty. Tymczasem pomiędzy wymiarami pajęczyna przeznaczenia coraz ciaśniej zaciska się… Jeden po drugim nowi gracze wkraczają na scenę, mając swoje własne powody. Historia młodej dziewczyny, która traci wszystko i zaczyna żyć zemstą.

title.en: E, Shanai System Subete Wan'ope shiteiru Watashi wo Kaiko desu ka?

altTitles.ja: え、社内システム全てワンオペしている私を解雇ですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: E, Shanai System Subete OneOpe shiteiru Watashi o Kaiko Desu ka?

altTitles.en: Eh, Are You Seriously Going to Fire Me When I’ve Been Handling the Company’s In-House System as a One-Man Show?

description.en:
Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons. 

To everyone working in a stressful company, this is a story that helps you smile a little for tomorrow's sake.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.en: The God and the Flightless Messenger

description.en: Shin, born to a race of winged messengers, faces life as an outsider due to the tiny deformed wings on his back. Flightless, he endures ridicule and loneliness. His people tend to the needs of the Gods who reside in the same mountains, and unexpectedly, he is tasked with the care of the mysterious God residing on Mountain 32. A troubling future looms ahead as Gods and Messengers have begun to disappear without a trace. What dangers await Shin and his people, and the Gods they care for?

Oniwa Asahi's just starting his high-school life, and he's decided it's time to turn over a new leaf and learn how to make friends and get to know those around him. How does someone who's terrible at interacting with other people go about doing that, though? Turns out, it's as easy as joining the Theatre Club and its quirky cast of characters, including the captain Imari, who seems to have his own issues opening up to others.

10 years since he reincarnated in hell…Takamichi is troubled. With the “Incubus” power unlocking further to become stronger by having sex with women but his growth peaked. “I’ll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!” Sexy & violent pretty girl battle fantasy!
description.pt-br: 10 anos desde que ele reencarnou no inferno ... O herói “Takamichi” está com problemas. Com o poder do “Incubus” de ficar mais forte fazendo sexo com mulheres, ele já não tinha mais inimigos e seu crescimento atingiu o pico. “Vou me mudar para uma nova área, esperem por mim, lindas mulheres do novo mundo!” Fantasia de batalha de menina bonita sexy e violenta!

description.en: While all of his classmate were transported to another world as heroes, for some reason he was left out as the dungeon master... and he, Satoshi Shinta, became the world's enemy. As the enemy of humankind, in order to survive and live a pleasant life in another world, he had a big choice to makeー. Through devilish methods, make his enemies fall, and strengthen his dungeon!! To violate his enemies or kill them, the curtain raises on (male) Satoshi Shinta's devilish dungeon management!!
description.id:
Disaat teman-temannya terisekaikan dan menjadi Hero, Nitta justru tercampakan dan menjadi seorang dungeon master, musuh dari seluruh umat manusia!  
tahu akan ancaman yang akan dihadapinya, dengan sekuat tenaga memperkuat dungeon yang dia buat, penyusup yang datang akan di tangkap, laki-laki akan di bunuh, sedangkan perempuan akan dijadikan mesin entod olehnya, semua itu dilakukannya demi menjalani hidup bajingan di isekai.

description.en: At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

The Story of a Man Who Is Reincarnated as the Shittiest Guy in a Doujin, but the Heroine Keeps on Coming Close to Him

altTitles.zh: 我转生成了NTR漫画里的黄毛，但是女主却倾心于我

altTitles.ru: Я перевоплотился в подонка из netorare манги, но героиня предпочла меня главному герою

altTitles.ja-ro: Netorare Manga no Kuzu Otoko ni Tensei Shita Hazu ga Heroine ga Yottekuru Ken

description.en: I suddenly remembered. This world is the world of an erotic manga, and that I was reincarnated as the scumbag who is supposed to steal the heroine in this world. Well, I don't have such a hobby, so I thought the heroine should get along with the protagonist. But why are you paying attention to me, heroine?
description.ja:
ふと俺は思い出した。この世界がエロ漫画の世界であり、ヒロインを寝取る役目のクズ男に自分が転生したことを。まあ俺にその趣味はないので、ヒロインは主人公と仲良くやってくれ。と思ったのに…ヒロイン、なんでお前は俺に構うんだよ!
小説投稿サイト掲載の人気作『漫画に登場する最悪の男に生まれ変わったはずがヒロインが寄ってくる件』をついにコミカライズ!
description.pt-br: De repente, eu me lembrei. Este mundo é o mundo de um mangá erótico, e eu reencarnei como o canalha que supostamente vai roubar a heroína neste mundo. Bem, eu não tenho esse tipo de hobby, então eu achei que a heroína deveria se dar bem com o protagonista. Mas por que você está prestando atenção em mim, heroína?

description.en: The manga centers on Kamo and his partner Tora, who work in the underworld as "avengers for hire," taking on jobs from the victims of violent crimes and families seeking vengeance for wrongs done to them.

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

Professional wrestler Yamamoto Shingo returned to Japan from a 5 year training trip in the US and Mexico, only to be greeted by his now defunct wrestling company: Yamato. He's come to find out that as soon as the president of the company passed away, the rival wrestling group Imperial Japan Pro Wrestling (IJPW) took down Yamato. Shingo is forced to seek revenge for Yamato by challenging the president of IJPW. One thing led to another, and now Shingo has been half-forced into working under IJPW as the new wrestler from Brazil: Agnes Mask.
A primitive tribe on an island. During a tempest, a young girl disappears. Ten years later, she mysteriously reappears. The contact with civilization seems to have changed her.

A series of different yandere images by the artist @RinRin200001.

Kang Sihwa was everyone's sun, always in the spotlight, and the people around Lee Eunseo were always jealous of her because of her special childhood friend Sihwa. One day, Sihwa, who had suddenly disappeared, returned a few years later. With the swaying of Eunseo’s heart and Sihwa’s unpredictable behavior. We have a special relationship, right? Don't you think so? But… I still want to ask. What are we both doing?

description.ko: 모두의 태양이자 주목받는 존재인 강시화, 그런 시화와 특별한 소꿉 친구 사이로 주변의 질투를 받던 이은서. 어느 날 홀연히 사라졌던 시화가 몇 년이 흘러 돌아왔다. 자꾸 흔들리는 은서의 마음과 도저히 짐작할 수 없는 시화의 행동. 우리는 특별한 사이잖아? 너도 그렇게 생각하지? 하지만… 묻고 싶어. 너랑 난 뭐하는 사이야?

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

title.en: The Legend of the Northern Blade

description.de:
Jahrzehntelang kämpften die tapferen Krieger der Nördlichen Himmlischen Sekte, um die Welt vor der bösartigen Stillen Nacht zu beschützen. Aber als der Anführer der vierten Generation beschuldigt wird, mit dem Feind gemeinsame Sache zu machen, ist er gezwungen, die Sekte aufzulösen und sich selbst umzubringen, um seinen Sohn Moowon zu beschützen. Ohne verbliebene Familie oder Verbündete lebt Moowon ein trostloses Leben unter ständiger Beobachtung ... bis ein plötzlicher Angriff der Stillen Nacht ihm die Gelegenheit gibt, in die Berge zu fliehen. Dort trainiert der junge Krieger, um die Kampftechniken seiner Vorfahren zu meistern, bevor das mysteriöse Verschwinden einer geliebten Person in zwingt, zurückzukehren. Folge Moowon auf seiner Reise, um den Tod seines Vaters zu rächen und die Bösewichte zu vernichten, die die Welt in Dunkelheit stürzen wollen!

description.en:
When the world was plunged into darkness by the ‘Silent Night’, Martial Artists from all over the place gathered to form the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’. With overwhelming strength from the Northern Heavenly Sect, the Silent Night was pushed away and the people began to enjoy peace once more. However, as time passed the martial artists from the mainlands began to conspire against the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’, and eventually caused the death of the Fourth Generation Sect Leader, Jin Kwan-Ho, destroying the sect with it. As everyone left the sect, Jin Kwan-Ho’s only son, Jin Mu-Won was left behind. Mu-Won has never learned anything about martial arts, but he eventually finds the Martial Techniques secretly left behind by his father and begins to acquire the martial arts of the Northern Heavenly Sect. Then one day, a mysterious girl appears before Mu-Won…!!

description.fr:
Depuis des décénies la secte céleste du nord se bat pour protéger le monde de la démoniaque Nuit Silencieuse. Mais le jour où le chef de la quatrième génération se retrouve accusé par l'alliance céleste d'avoir collaboré avec l'ennemi, il est obligé de dissoudre la secte et de s'ôter la vie pour protéger son fils, Moowon. Laissé seul, sans famille ni alliés, Moowon vit une vie morose, sous haute surveillance... jusqu'au moment où une attaque surprise de la Nuit Silencieuse lui donne une chance de s'échapper dans les montagnes. Là-bas, le jeune guerrier s'entraîne afin de maîtriser les techniques de combat de ses prédecesseurs, jusqu'à ce que la mort d'un être cher le ramène sur ses anciennes terres. Suivez l'histoire de Moowon, dans sa quête d'héroisme et de vengeance, tandis qu'il se bat pour éliminer ceux qui ont trahi son père, et les démons menaçant de plonger le monde dans l'obscurité !

description.ja:
かつて世の中を混乱に陥らせた集団「密夜」を倒すために、武術の達人たちを集めて作られた「北天門」！ その強力な守りの中で密夜は影を潜め、「北天門」は「中原」の平和を代表する集団となった。 しかし次第に「北天門」に対して妬みを持つ者が現れ、四代目門主「秦 虎星」は裏切り者達に囲まれた中、自ら命を絶ってしまう… 皆が去った「北天門」に一人残された虎星の息子、「秦 天翔」。武術に関しては何も知らない幼い少年だったが、人知れず父に伝授された古語によって「北天門」の壁に刻まれた武術を身につけ始める！ そんなある日、「秦 天翔」の前に正体不明の一人の娘が現れたのだが..!!

description.ko:
무협소설의 최강자 우각의 동명 소설 <북검전기>가 만화로 새롭게 태어나다!

세상을 혼란에 빠뜨린 집단 밀야에 맞서기 위해 중원의 고수들이 모여 만들어낸 북천문!
북천문의 강력한 투쟁으로 밀야는 서서히 그 모습을 감추었고, 북천문은 중원을 평화를 대표하는 집단으로서 강력한 위용을 과시하게 되었다.
그러나 평화가 길어지자 중원의 고수들 사이에서는 북천문에 대한 은밀한 시기가 생겨났고, 결국 북천문의 4대 문주인 진관호는 배신자들에게 둘러싸인 채 스스로 목숨을 끊음으로서 파국의 끝을 맞이하게 된다. 
모두가 떠난 북천문에 홀로 남은 진관호의 아들 진무원(13세)은 무공이라고는 손톱만큼도 알지 못 하는 어린 소년. 그러나 남몰래 아버지가 전수한 고어(古語)를 통해 북천문의 벽에 새겨진 무공을 익히기 시작한다. 
그러던 어느날, 진무원의 앞에 정체를 알 수 없는 한 소녀가 나타나게 되는데…!!

description.ru:
Когда мир погрузился во тьму, мастера боевых искусств собрались, чтобы сформировать «Северный небесный клан». Благодаря ей люди снова обрели мир и покой. Однако с течением времени мастера боевых искусств начали строить заговор против «северного небесного клана», который в конечном итоге привел к смерти лидера клана, Джин Кван-Хо, и уничтожению клана вместе с ним. Когда все покинули клан, единственный сын Джин Кван-Хо, Джин Му-Вон, остался в нем. Му-Вон никогда не изучал боевые искусства, но он находит Технику, тайно оставленную его отцом, и начинает изучать боевые искусства Северного Небесного Клана.

description.pt-br: Quando o mundo mergulhou na escuridão pela 'Noite Silenciosa', artistas marciais de todo o lugar se reuniram para formar a 'Seita Celestial do Norte'. Com uma força esmagadora da Seita Celestial do Norte, a Noite Silenciosa foi afastada e o povo começou a desfrutar a paz mais uma vez. No entanto, com o passar do tempo, os artistas marciais do continente começaram a conspirar contra a 'Seita Celestial do Norte' e, eventualmente, causaram a morte do líder da seita da quarta geração, Jin Kwan-Ho, destruindo a seita com ela. Quando todos deixaram a seita, o único filho de Jin Kwan-Ho, Jin Mu-Won, foi deixado para trás. Mu-Won nunca aprendeu nada sobre artes marciais, mas ele finalmente encontra as Técnicas Marciais secretamente deixadas para trás por seu pai e começa a adquirir as artes marciais da Seita Celestial do Norte. Então, um dia...

title.en: The Strongest Lv1 Support in the World

description.en: “Even if I can only use primary healing skill, I still want to become the strongest!” The LV1 healer boy and the weakest God’s chosen girl started their journey with the goal of becoming the strongest. However, the Young man did not expect that this time would be his last journey.
description.id: “Bahkan jika aku hanya bisa menggunakan teknik penyembuhan dasar, aku ingin menjadi yang terkuat!” Seorang bocah healer level 1 dan gadis pilihan dewa terlemah memulai perjalanan mereka dengan tujuan menjadi yang terkuat.  Namun, pemuda itu tidak menyangka bahwa kali ini akan menjadi perjalanan terakhirnya.

description.en: I am 30 years old, jobless and in despair, when I was invited to become a "Girls Bar Manager." So I entered the world of urban nightlife, and what awaited me was a very cute cast of girls. However, the owner had an ironclad rule for me: "Never touch any of the bar girls." I wonder if I will be able to stick to the rule...... This adult-themed romantic comedy takes place in a girls bar, a place of relaxation for gentlemen!

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
Song An, the bottom social animal, is a down-and-out programmer. His daily work is responsible for fixing bugs in a game called [New World]. However, he is more keen to secretly add his own little easter eggs in the game. Turned into a real world, relying on the understanding of the bugs in the game and the easter eggs set by himself, can Song An successfully counterattack?

Alternative Official English Translation: [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-king-of-gaming-bugs/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/the-king-of-gaming-bugs), [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/the-king-gaming-bugs?content_id=2080812), [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/the-king-of-gaming-bugs!_25198369705160901)
description.fr: Song An, asociable, est un programmeur à bout de souffle. Son travail quotidien est de corriger les bugs dans un jeu appelé [New World]. Cependant, il est plus désireux d’ajouter secrètement ses propres petits œufs de Pâques dans le jeu. Transformé en un monde réel, en s’appuyant sur la compréhension des bugs du jeu et des œufs de Pâques posés par elle-même, Song An peut réussir à contre-attaquer ?

altTitles.ja-ro: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

altTitles.es-la: Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Idol Inútil E Seu Único Fã No Mundo

altTitles.en: Damedol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

description.en:
In order to trace the culprit behind his family’s murder in his childhood, Vampire Hunter Heilo accepts a kill order from a client. 

His target is the head of the Livera Group, Herrace. Heilo joins Herrace’s company, and successfully acquires a position as the personal secretary of Herrace himself, who is known for his dominating presence in politics and the underworld. 

However, Herrace’s special treatment gradually causes Heilo’s heart to sway… 

What will his fate be, having fallen for the man he's supposed to kill?!
description.fr:
Le chasseur de vampires Heilo effectue une mission d'assassinat pour un client afin de trouver des indices qui pourraient le conduire à la personne qui a assassiné sa famille lorsqu'il était enfant. La cible à laquelle Heilo doit faire face est le chef du groupe Rivera, Hereis. Pendant son infiltration, Heilo a rejoint la société d'Hereis, connue pour être un gros bonnet dans le monde politique et ses coulisses. Il réussit ensuite à devenir son secrétaire exécutif. Cependant, le traitement spécial d'Hereis ne cesse d'ébranler les convictions d'Heilo...

Quel sera le destin d'Heilo s'il tombe amoureux d'un homme qu'il doit tuer !

En co-prod avec la Boulangerie

title.en: Sensei! Bokutachi ga Sekai wo Horoboshimasu.

altTitles.ja: 先生！ 僕たちが世界を滅ぼします。

altTitles.en: Teacher, we will destroy the world!
The strongest Assassin as a Teacher

description.en:
A "Teacher" has a sacred job that protects and guides students.

In this world where people who can use magic and people who cannot use magic coexist, Solo is a sorcerer who lives alone.
He is also known as No. 0, a skilled assassin who always completes any request he receives.

"As part of a certain mission, I am assigned to teach at a magic school, and the teenagers I am assigned to teach are the students of the Class 2D, which is made up of dropouts."

While he is desperately playing the role of a teacher in order to complete his mission, a transfer student arrives and the situation takes an unexpected turn...

A school fantasy unfolding between a false teacher and the strongest assassin and the most evil students who serve as his "beacon"!
description.ja:
『教師』とは、生徒を守り、教え導く聖なる仕事。
魔法が使える人間と使えない人間が混在するこの世界で、孤独に生きる一人の魔導士・ソロ。
受けた依頼は必ず完遂するという凄腕の殺し屋・No.0（ナンバーゼロ）という異名も持つ彼は、
とある任務の一件で魔法学校で教師をすることになりますが、そこで担任することになったのは、学年の落ちこぼれが集まる２年Ｄ組。
任務遂行のために必死に教師を演じている最中、そこに転校生がやってきて事態は思わぬ方向に…。
偽りの教師で最強の暗殺者と、彼の“標”となる最凶の生徒たちが繰り広げる学園ファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”  
  
As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es: "Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".    De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.

altTitles.vi: Các Hiệp sĩ trong khu Vực

altTitles.th: อัศวินในพื้นที่

description.en:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).
description.pt-br: Suguru e Kakeru são dois irmãos que jogam futebol como ninguém. Suguru, aos 15 anos, já se tornou estrela da seleção japonesa; já Kakeru? bem, ele é tão talentoso quanto o irmão, mas decidiu abandonar os gramados e atuar só como auxiliar técnico depois de um acidente na oitava série. Claro, Suguru sabe do talento que o irmão tem e não se conforma com a decisão dele. O que poderá acontecer para que Kakeru mude de ideia e volte a ajudar o time de dentro de campo, onde seu irmão o espera??

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand.... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。
ネコと暮らす不思議な日常。猫創作マンガ

“青春是什么？羞耻+矫情+自以为是+自我意识过剩+……” 高校男生南号、尚风是从小玩到大的死党。这是关于他们最纯粹的友谊，最热闹、无厘头的校园青春故事！

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

description.en:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

description.en:
Akira Ichijo is your average, run-of-the-mill businessman.

One day, on his way home from work, he is suddenly attacked by a Minotaur and killed on the spot. But in the blink of an eye... he wakes up back at the office!

When monsters invade into the real world, a cruel reality sets in as the world as we know it plummets into destruction and death. But with the unique skill [Resurrection], Akira can come back to life every time he dies, all the while inheriting the same levels and skills from his last run at life!

With unlimited chances to correct his past mistakes, it's up to Akira to utilize the skill he's given and survive this terrifying world with his childhood friend, Nao Nanase.

Unknowingly swapped upon birth, Princess Brianna lost her identity as a princess and became a vagrant orphan. One day, her Imperial Father suddenly sought her back, reinstating her back to her rightful identity as the nation's princess. However, what awaited her was not a family reunion nor was it an extravagant life, but instead, she was to become a sacrifice for the god. Reincarnated into the body of Princess Brianna, our main character only wants to change her fate of death, yet realises that the best way to do so is to become the sacrifice. The only way she can live is by becoming the sacrifice, as hidden scheming along with its causes and effects, slowly unravel in front of her eyes. (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)

(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

**Note:** This is the **page style** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/7226ef70-592f-42b5-a3ff-8b91af15d97f)
description.zh: （架空朝代）大陈年间，菁贵妃霞光中诞下双生龙凤胎。皇子生来眉间一颗朱砂痣，皇女天生六指 。祥瑞与不祥同时出现，令同胞双生的二人迎来截然不同的命运，被迫与至亲分离。天劫将至，自出生便相离的他们是否能重逢？彼此又以何种方式与天命相争？

description.en:
"A useless thing like you has no value in our family. Take this money and leave immediately!"

"Yes! Goodbye!"

She became the incompetent villainess who commits wrongdoings in order to earn the love of her fiancé, the male lead. Her reputation was already at rock bottom and the main characters, who can't live without each other, are having an affair.

"Getting kicked out and receiving money is good enough!"

So after she was kicked out, she set up a stationery store in front of a school. She reminisces of snacks, beer candy, and even bubbles! Just you wait, kids! But… somehow her young customers are a little weird?

"I'll find you a handsome and modest man, and not someone who has an affair like my brother!"

"Ha, then what about my brother, the crown prince?”

"…the tower master is the best."

The great magic swordsman, the crown prince, the villainous tower master, and finally, the hidden villain. The stationery store, which she thought would be peaceful, left her with no rest.

*Help me! I just wanted to live a normal life!*

---
What's a girl to do when she wakes up in the body of a villainess? Meldenique Babelloa is a supporting character in a romance novel starring her fiancé, Duke Lennox Hessman, and… her sister, Sheria! Heartbroken, she eventually dies a tragic death as a villainess… or so the original story goes. Determined not to follow the script, Meldenique resolutely abandons her old life and sets out to open… a stationery shop! Will she succeed in defying fate and building the stationery shop of her dreams?

---

description.fr:
«Une chose inutile comme toi n’a aucune valeur dans notre famille. Prends cet argent et pars immédiatement!»

«Oui! Au revoir!»

Elle est devenue la méchante incompétente qui commet des actes répréhensibles afin de gagner l’amour de son fiancé, le protagoniste. Sa réputation était déjà au plus bas et les personnages principaux, qui ne peuvent pas vivre l’un sans l’autre, ont une liaison.

«Se faire virer et recevoir de l’argent, c’est déjà bien!»

Ainsi, après avoir été mise à la porte, elle a ouvert une papeterie devant une école. Elle se souvient des snacks, des bonbons à la bière, et même des bulles ! Attendez, les enfants ! Mais… ses jeunes clients sont un peu bizarres?

«Je te trouverai un homme beau et modeste, et pas quelqu’un qui a une liaison comme mon frère!»

«Ha, alors qu’en est-il de mon frère, le prince héritier?»

«…le maître de la tour est le meilleur.»

Le grand épéiste magique, le prince héritier, le méchant maître de la tour, et enfin, le méchant caché. La papeterie, qu’elle pensait être paisible, ne lui laissait aucun répit. Aidez-moi! Je voulais juste vivre une vie normale!

description.ko:
남주의 약혼녀이지만, 그의 사랑을 받기 위해 악행을 저지르는 무능한 악녀에 빙의했다. 
이미 평판은 밑바닥이고, 서로 죽고 못 사는 주인공들은 저들끼리 불륜까지 막 저지르는 막장 상황. 

"너 같이 쓸모 없는 것은 우리 가문에 있을 가치가 없다. 이 돈을 받고 썩 꺼지거라!"
"네! 안녕히 계세요!" 

그래서 냉큼 돈 받고 쫓겨나 학교 앞에 추억의 문구점을 차렸다. 
추억의 쫀드기, 맥주사탕, 비눗방울 놀이까지! 어린이들 기다려! 

그런데.... 어쩐지 내 어린 고객님들이 좀 이상하다? 

"내가, 우리 오빠 같은 불륜남 말고 잘생기고 조신한 남자 찾아 줄게요!"
"헉, 그럼 황태자이신 우리 형님은 어때?" 
"....마탑주님이 최고야." 

그렇게 위대한 마검, 차기 황태자, 악역인 마탑주, 그리고 최종 흑막까지 엮이게 되면서 
평화로울 줄만 알았던 문구점에는 하루도 바람 잘 날이 없는데. 

살려줘! 난 그냥 평범하게 살고 싶었을 뿐이라고!

description.pt:
O que uma garota deve fazer quando acorda no corpo de uma vilã? Meldenique Babelloa é uma personagem coadjuvante em um romance estrelado por seu noivo, o duque Lennox Hessman, e… sua irmã, Sheria! Com o coração partido, ela eventualmente morre uma morte trágica como uma vilã… ou assim diz a história original. Determinada a não seguir o roteiro, Meldenique abandona resolutamente sua antiga vida e se propõe a abrir... uma papelaria! Será que ela conseguirá desafiar o destino e construir a papelaria dos seus sonhos?

description.ru:
"Такая бесполезная вещь, как ты, не имеет ценности в нашей семье. Возьми эти деньги и немедленно уходи!"
 "Хорошо! Прощай!"
Она стала некомпетентной злодейкой, которая совершает проступки, чтобы заслужить любовь своего жениха, главного героя.
Её репутация уже была на дне, и главные герои, которые не могут жить друг без друга, заводят роман.
" Быть выгнанным и получать деньги - это хорошо!"
Поэтому после того, как её выгнали, она открыла магазин канцелярских товаров перед школой. Она продаёт закуски, пивные конфеты и даже пузыри! Погодите, детки!
Но… почему-то её молодые клиенты немного странные?
"Я найду тебе красивого и скромного мужчину, а не такого , у которого есть роман, как у моего брата!"
"Ха, а что насчет моего брата, крон-принца?"
"… мастер башни - лучший. *
Великий магический фехтовальщик, следующий кронпринц, злодейский хозяин башни и, наконец, скрытый злодей.
Магазин канцелярских товаров, который, как она думала, будет мирным, не оставлял ей покоя.
Помогите мне! Я просто хотела жить нормальной жизнью!

description.uk:
— Ти ганьбиш ім'я нашої родини. Забирай ці гроші та вали звідси!
-Чудово! Бувай!

Вона прийшла до тями ні на що не здатною злодійкою, яка творила зло, щоб завоювати любов її нареченого, головного героя.

Її репутація і так була на дні, а головні герої, які не можуть жити один без одного, закрутили роман.
-Мене хоч і виперли, але дали гроші - вже непогано!

Після того, як її вигнали з дому, вона відкрила перший магазин канцелярських товарів перед школою. Крім іншого, там продаються закуски, солодощі та навіть жуйка! Ну, дітлахи, тримайтеся!
Але... Чому її юні клієнти такі дивні?

-Я знайду тобі гарного і скромного хлопця, а не дурня, що ходить ліворуч, як мій брат!
-Ха, а як щодо мого брата, наслідного принца?
—Господар Башти просто найкращий.

Великий магічний воїн, королівський принц, жахливий власник вежі та таємничий лиходій.

Мирне життя, яке вона хотіла від магазину канцелярії, обернулася зовсім інакше.
Допоможіть! Я просто хотіла жити нормальним життям!

description.vi:
“Một thứ vô dụng như mày không xứng đáng ở trong gia đình này. Cầm lấy số tiền này và cút đi!” “Được rồi! Tạm biệt!” Cô trở thành một nhân vật phản diện bất tài, thực hiện những hành vi sai trái để giành được tình yêu của vị hôn phu của mình, nam chính. Danh tiếng của cô đã xuống đáy và các nhân vật chính, những người vốn không thể sống thiếu nhau, đang có quan hệ tình cảm với nhau. “Bị đuổi ra ngoài mà được nhận tiền là quá tốt rồi!” Vì vậy, sau khi cô ấy bị đuổi ra khỏi nhà, cô ấy đã mở một cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm ở phía trước của một trường học. Cô ấy hồi tưởng lại về đồ ăn nhẹ, kẹo bia, và thậm chí cả chơi với bong bóng xà phòng! Các em chỉ cần chờ thôi, mấy nhóc à! Nhưng… Không hiểu sao những khách hàng trẻ tuổi của cô lại có chút kỳ lạ? “Em sẽ tìm cho chị một chàng trai đẹp mã và khiêm tốn, và cả chưa từng yêu ai như anh trai em chẳng hạn!” “Ha, vậy còn anh trai em, hoàng thái tử thì sao?” “… Chủ tháp là tuyệt nhất. ” Kiếm sĩ ma thuật vĩ đại, tiếp đó là hoàng thái tử, chủ nhân của tòa tháp tàn độc và cuối cùng là nhân vật phản diện giấu mặt. Cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm mà cô tưởng chừng sẽ yên bình lại khiến cô không nghỉ ngơi được.

description.zh:
“像你这样没用的东西在我们家毫无价值，拿上这笔钱，马上离开!”

“是的!再见!”

她成为了一个无能的女反派，为了赢得她的未婚夫——男主角的爱，她做了很多错事。她的名声已经跌到谷底，而主角们，不能离开彼此，却有了外遇。

“被踢出去收钱就够了!”

在她被赶出来后，她在一所学校前开了一家文具店。她回忆起零食，啤酒糖果，甚至泡泡!孩子们，等着瞧吧!

但不知怎的，她的年轻顾客有点奇怪?

“我会给你找个英俊而谦虚的男人，而不是像我哥哥那样有外遇的人!”

“哈，那我的哥哥太子呢?”

“……塔的主人是最好的。”

伟大的神剑手，下一任王储，恶毒的塔主，隐藏的恶棍。

她本以为她的文具店会很安静，但现在却让她无法休息。

帮帮我!我只想过正常的生活!

description.zh-hk:
她附身在了雖是男主的未婚妻，但卻為了得到男主的愛而做下惡行的無能惡女身上。

風評已經到底了，還身處沒有彼此不能活的主角之間出軌的狗血狀況。

“像你這樣沒用的東西待在我們家族沒有任何價值。拿著這些錢滾吧！” “是！再見！” 所以立刻拿了錢被趕出去，在學校門前開了一家記憶中的文具店。

回憶中的橡皮糖，啤酒糖，再到吹肥皂泡泡！小孩子們等著吧！但是... 我的小客人怎麼有點兒奇怪？

“我，不要我哥哥那樣的出軌男，給你找長得帥的正經男人！” “嗬，那麼我哥哥皇太子怎麼樣？” “.…魔法塔主是最棒的。”

就那樣偉大的魔劍，下一任皇太子，反派魔法塔主，還被牽扯到最終的黑幕之中，本以為很平和的文具店沒有一天風平浪靜。

救救我！我只是想過平凡的生活！

---

altTitles.en: I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead
I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

title.en: In the Name of Bai Ze

description.en: Several decades ago, the young boy Bai Ze mistakenly entered a mystical world's immortal mountain and formed a bond with an Immortal Gege. Over ten years later, the college student Baize once again arrives in the mystical realm, only to discover that the Immortal Gege he had dreamed of day and night has become a pitiable figure forgotten by the mortal world. In a world where demons and monsters wreak havoc, the unfortunate originator turns out to be this pitiful divine being. Unable to ignore the situation, Bai Ze forcefully brings his Immortal Gege back into the mortal realm, helping him fulfill his desire for a peaceful life. After all, who could resist someone so beautiful, powerful yet pitiful?
description.pl: Młody chłopiec o imieniu Bai Ze przypadkiem wszedł do mistycznego świata, w którym normalne było potwory i bóstwa. Zaprzyjaźnił się tam z przystojnym nieśmiertelnym mężczyzną, lecz musiał wracać do rodziców. Ponad dziesięć lat później Bai Ze ponownie trafia do tajemniczego wymiaru, gdzie odkrywa, że poznane uprzednio bóstwo, o którym śnił nocami i dniami, stało się zapomnianą przez wszystkich postacią. Nie będąc w stanie tego zignorować, Bai Ze siłą zabiera go do swojego świata, pomagając mu spełnić marzenie o spokojnym życiu.
description.zh: 十数年前，小正太白泽误入异世仙山，与神仙大哥哥结缘。 十数年后，大学生白泽再次来到异世，却发现日思夜梦的神仙大哥哥成了被人世遗忘的可怜人 世间妖魔作乱，始作俑者却就是这个可怜兮兮的神仙。 没办法，白泽硬拉着神仙哥哥重新入世，帮他完成安稳世间的愿望，谁让他又美又强又惨呢？
